name: Zero Days Since
storyline:
It has been zero days since the last workplace injury.

You are a warehouse associate for Quantum Fulfillment Services, the fastest growing logistics company in the world. They have somehow managed to significantly undercut every competitor's delivery speed and pricing. Whatever they are doing is resulting in an exceptionally hazardous work environment. Make sure to wear your personal protective equipment (PPE) and watch your back. Slips, trips, and falls are the least of your concerns in this warehouse.
summary: A co-op survival horror game where you work as a warehouse associate for the world's fastest growing logistics company. Pick orders and stage them for shipment, but watch your back while you work, you can't shake the feeling that something (or things) is watching you.
